Vamprah:

"A maximal would be better"replied Vamprah "Maximals aren't idiot and 
they could notice anything and suspect... but I guess that you have 
an expert that could convert a predacon pod into a Maximal"

> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ frowns, shaking his head. "No, we don't have one on board. 
However, we can go out and find one, or convert a Predacon pod into a 
Maximal one."
